short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage sales and customer relationships directly inside Facebook Messenger.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
📝🧑   ParrotLeads™ plug-in connects to Facebook™ Messenger to manage more leads in less time. Reduce switching back and forth between your inbox and other tools and windows! 
Close deals faster while managing all your contacts in one central database. 

✔  Note: Free ParrotLeads™ account is required to use this extension & CRM.  It’s free to get started. 

A quick way to manage and add leads, contacts to your ParrotLeads™ CRM & Facebook Messenger!

⦿ Manage ParrotLeads™ FB Messenger and Social from single browser window.

Extension Highlights:

• Create new leads and contacts right from Facebook.
• See complete lead/contact detail when you open a message. 
• Add tasks, events, log calls for a customer and client. 
• Create deals and notes for instant updates. 
• FREE extension; no credit card required.
• Installs in seconds, easy to use. 
 
💻  A simple and yet super effective software to use with leads and schedule with prospects. This extension is an incredible time saver and will keep you organized - never lose another lead again.  

ParrotLeads™ allows you to Effortlessly Follow Up and Close Your Dream Customers and Clients Without The Headache Of Getting Lost In Your FB Messenger Messages!
Turn your Messenger into a user-friendly CRM.  Use our plug-in so you can keep track of your sales process and never leave a messenger conversation cold again!!  👻

🕒 Save time as well as generate income from your Facebook™ Messenger!  
Organize your Messages, Leads & Sales. 

➡️ Connect with some of your most qualified prospects. 
A Super easy follow-up and possibly never-lose a sale because of not following up!
Our simple to use plugin organizes and optimizes FB Messenger.

💬 Manage FB Conversations!  Label, Tag, Organize, Automate Scheduled Calls in FB Messenger. Create Google Calendar Events directly from within FB messenger,  get reminded to follow up with a scheduled notes on the calendar!

🔆 Organic Marketing is Made Easy 🏝️

Export Messages to your current CRM!  

📋  ParrotLeads™ integrates messenger exactly into your current sales cycle systems as well.  
Our plug-in-organizes your social inbox with labels like “Follow Up”, “Call Back" & “Interested” for 

🗓️  Sync Calendars, Email autoresponders, text marketing using Webhooks!

⏩ Set speeds for voice chats, saving you time!

There's Room for you; Create Special messenger templates! 

ParrotLeads™ allows you to send broadcast messages based on tags! 

You don’t have to re-write messages over and over ever again! Turning your Organic Facebook Messenger Marketing into a highly effective sales producing, client generating, Profile Profiteering machine.  Created Canned Responses to reduce time in the funnel process!

In A Click of a Button,  Reduce Repetition & Automate from one window! ♻️

With ParrotLeads™ Use;

✔️ Google Calendar Integration
✔️ Funnel Integration
✔️ Apply Tags to Messages
✔️ Schedule Notifications 
✔️ Use Canned Responses
✔️ Save Custom Sales Notes
✔️ Filter by: Tag, Note, and Last Response
✔️ FB Messenger Broadcasts
✔️ FB Messenger Calendar & Campaign Integrations
✔️ Re-tag after sending a Broadcast
✔️ Delete Friends Based on Tag
✔️ Add & Use Canned Responses
✔️ Enhanced NOTES* & Automations
✔️ Sales Frameworks | Be able to share global segments, tags
✔️ Pipelines Export leads from Facebook Messenger 



All right inside the FACEBOOK MESSENGER, This extension is not affiliated with Facebook or the Messenger platform.

Disclaimer:  ParrotLeads™ has no affiliation, is not endorsed or sponsored by Facebook™.   All copyrights belong to their respective owners. This Chrome extension is not owned by, is not licensed by and is not a subsidiary of Facebook™.  All articles, images, logos and trademarks in this Chrome extension are property of their respective owners.  We respect your privacy, we do not sell or transfer user data to third parties, outside of the approved use cases.  We do not use or transfer user data for purposes that are unrelated to my item's single purpose.  We do not use or transfer user data to determine creditworthiness or for lending purposes.
